mapper.insert: insert into member ( member_no, member_id, member_nickname, member_pw, member_email, member_gender, member_birthday, member_phone, member_name ) values ( seq_member_no.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_pw}, #{member_email} , #{member_gender}, TO_DATE(#{member_birthday},'yy.MM.dd'), #{member_phone},#{member_name} )
